name: finalpass-root
description: Root package to manage FinalPass application

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run client --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
